reviewText: Have used this product as an educational tool.  Especially appreciate the on-screen written script on The Mountaintop speech.

I was very disappointed, I thought I'd be getting a detailed account of the night April 3,1968 and events leading up to that night and that incredible speech but instead the film basically was fragmented clips of Dr. Kings life and the quality of the film was poor, if you own "Citizen King" a PBS Documentary which I do, then this is an unnecessary purchase. Therewas not enough elaboration on this speech and the circumstances surrounding it.

I am so proud that I have this piece of History to add to my collection.  There were times when growing up and life challenges, I would wonder, if a change would ever come. I will treasure it forever.
Great to have a piece of history in this copy of original Dr. Martin Luther King recorded speeches and some footage.
I love this DVD. It has made a great impact on me and my family. This is an excellent addition to my Black History collection.
I was disapointed in this dvd because there was no narration and no one speaking at all.  This dvd only showed raw footage of the civil rights movement.

This item was really not what I had expected.  The "Eyes on the prize" chapter "The Promised Land" is the best look I've seen on the Memphis speech and the events surrounding it, but "Citizen King" and the History Channel's "King" also do a good job.
